Phrase.Text: I never thought I'd see the day where [YourLeaderName] came to the rescue of the Torian people. This almost makes up for that 10,000 years of slavery you subjected us to. ... Almost.
Let us set out to thwart your afflicted kinsmen.

I see our former creations have shown more sympathy towards your dire situation than we ever could. An alliance of steel and villainy fighting an alliance of treachery and malice. May the war claim all involved parties.
